annotations.description: Deployment template for a angular on nginx

parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the openshift objects defined in this template. It is also the name of runtime image you want.
parameters.name: NAME

parameters.description: The namespace where to get the above image name
parameters.name: IMAGE_NAMESPACE

parameters.description: OpenShift cluster private IP range in CIDR notation, used by Nginx ngx_http_realip_module.
parameters.name: REAL_IP_FROM

parameters.description: Additional known and trusted reverse proxy ips conforming to nginx set_real_ip_from directive syntax. Multiple directives are allowed, separated by semicolon.
parameters.name: AdditionalRealIpFromRules

parameters.description: The exposed hostname that will route to the service, e.g., myappname.pathfinder.gov.bc.ca, if left blank a value will be defaulted.
parameters.name: APPLICATION_DOMAIN

parameters.description: The TAG name for this environment, e.g., dev, test, prod
parameters.name: TAG_NAME
